h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Earth Wolf
content: The Earth Wolf can also perform two short lunging bite attacks in fairly quick succession, moving itself forward with each bite to try and lock onto you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Earth Wolf'.
The content is as follows:
The Earth Wolf can also perform two short lunging bite attacks in fairly quick succession, moving itself forward with each bite to try and lock onto you.
